fail_msg will be printed: found a path where from_stop_id is same as to_stop_id
column3: SELECT * from stops where from_stop_id = to_stop_id

fail_msg will be printed: stop_lat is required for loctions which are stops (location_type = 0)
column3: SELECT * from stops where location_type = 0 AND stop_lat is NULL

fail_msg will be printed: stop_lat is required for loctions which are stations (location_type = 1)
column3: SELECT * from stops where location_type = 1 AND stop_lat is NULL

fail_msg will be printed: stop_lat is required for loctions which are entrances/exits (location_type = 2)
column3: SELECT * from stops where location_type = 2 AND stop_lat is NULL

fail_msg will be printed: stop_id found that is not in the stops file
column3: SELECT * FROM pathways where pathways.stop_id NOT IN (select stop_id from stops)
